Reference

Editing EML

add_creator_id()

Add an ORCID or reference ID to a creator

create_attributes_table()

Create/Edit EML attributes

edit_attribute()

Edit a single attribute

return_eml_units()

Return EML units

which_in_eml()

Search through EMLs

Working with data packages

clone_package()

Clone packages between DataONE Member Nodes

copy_package()

Copy packages between DataONE Member Nodes with new identifiers

download_package()

Download a data package (optionally with child packages)

download_packages()

Download multiple data packages

obsolete_package()

Obsolete a DataONE Package with a new version

plot_pkg_structure()

Plot package structure

Quality assurance

qa_eml()

Quality assurance for EML metadata

qa_package()

Check package including congruence of attributes and data

Miscellaneous

excel_to_csv()

Convert Excel workbook to multiple csv files

get_awards()

Get NSF Arctic/Polar program award information

query_all_versions()

Solr query all versions of a PID
